hero.description: Translate intent in a professional context. Shape tone, power dynamics, and cultural norms into a message you can communicate with confidence. Even in foreign languages.

features.sectionDescription: The same intent requires different words depending on who you're speaking to, how they prefer to receive information, and what cultural norms apply.

translatePage.title: Professional Message Rewriting — Powered by AI
translatePage.description: Select a message type and customize the context to generate culturally appropriate translations
translatePage.formalityCasualTooltip: Relaxed, conversational language with no formal structure.
translatePage.formalityInformalTooltip: Friendly and professional, but without strict conventions.
translatePage.formalityNeutralTooltip: Standard professional tone with balanced structure and clarity.
translatePage.formalityFormalTooltip: Polished, structured language following professional norms.
translatePage.formalityInstitutionalTooltip: Official, policy-aligned wording suitable for legal or HR contexts.
translatePage.directnessIndirectTooltip: The message is implied rather than stated outright.
translatePage.directnessDiplomaticTooltip: Clear intent delivered with softening language.
translatePage.directnessClearTooltip: The message is explicit, balanced, and easy to understand.
translatePage.directnessDirectTooltip: The point is stated plainly with minimal cushioning.
translatePage.directnessBluntTooltip: The message is delivered without softening or mitigation.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivityLowTooltip: Focuses on facts and outcomes, not emotions.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivityContainedTooltip: Acknowledges emotion briefly without centering it.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivityAttentiveTooltip: Recognizes emotional impact while staying task-focused.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivitySensitiveTooltip: Actively validates feelings alongside the message.
translatePage.emotionalSensitivityHighTooltip: Emotion is central and carefully addressed throughout.
translatePage.customInputDescription: Enter your own message title and topic description
translatePage.customInputTopicPlaceholder: e.g., Politely declining a meeting invitation due to schedule conflicts
